name: Admin Author Filter
author: Don Kukral

sections.description:
Used to filter posts by author in admin dashboard

sections.installation:
Copy “admin-author-filter” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory.
Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.changelog:
1.2

Verified compatibility with WP 4.0

1.1

Verified compatibility with WP 3.9.1

1.0.1

Added license and copyright information

1.0

Initial Version
